feature.label: UCDetector
feature.description: UCDetector (Unnecessary Code Detector) is a eclipse PlugIn tool to find unnecessary (dead) public java code. For example public classes, methods or fields which have no references. UCDetector creates markers for the following problems, which appear in the eclipse problem view. - Unnecessary (dead) code - Code where the visibility could be changed to protected, default or - private - Methods of fields, which can be final
